abstracts.cdata!:
The project will provide investment and
            recurrent expenditures for the : (i) setting up of an
            appropriately staffed and streamlined organization and
            management structure, based on a single chain of command
            from headquarters to the field, and able to provide
            effective leadership; (ii) introduction of a cost-effective
            extension methodology to enhance the adoption of improved
            technologies by project participants; (iii) acquisition and
            maintenance of new or upgraded physical infrastructure,
            including staff housing and training facilities, equipment
            and materials, and vehicles required to enable staff to
            attend a higher degree of coverage of the farming community;
            (iv) stregthening of the Ministry of Agriculture and
            Livestock Development's (MALD) implementation capacity
            through the provision of technical assistance; and (v)
            preparation of the second phase of the agricultural and
            livestock rehabilitation process.
